TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的所有项的聚合。The class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. 类包含零个或多对象。The class contains zero or more objects. 每个列表包含零个或多个对象表示在面板中的实际项和派生自类。Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the class. 下表显示了两种技术可以提供来填充面板中的组件，包括自定义控件的项。The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls. |技术Technique|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |请求模型Pull model|在设计器组件类，该类派生自类中，提供通过此集合属性。The designer for the component class, which is derived from the class, supplies this collection through the property. 它必须显示在面板时，设计器基础结构将读取此属性。The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |推送模型Push model|一个或作为参数对的调用中提供方法的与组件关联。A or is supplied as a parameter in a call to the method of the associated with the component.| 设计器基础结构通过创建智能标记面板，其构造函数采用两个参数的类型来构造一个面板。The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type . 列表，其中包含提取和推送项，集合将合并为一个面板。The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel. 因为它派生类，使用的内部来存储它的集合对象。Because it derives from the class, uses an internal to store its collection of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一系列对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 向 Windows 窗体组件附加智能标记](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As DesignerActionList(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignerActionList ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 类型的一维数组，它是从当前集合复制的元素的目标数组。

span.span: The one-dimensional array of type that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.

param.span: 该数组的索引必须从零开始。

span.span: The array must have zero-based indexing.

param.name: index
param.span: array 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

span.span: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 将当前集合的元素复制到提供的数组，从指定的数组索引开始。

span.span: Copies the elements of the current collection into the supplied array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法引发了异常复制时，是不确定的目标数组的状态。If the method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined. 例如，如果或发生时，目标数组可能处于部分填充的状态。For example, if an or occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.

span.span: is .
is less than 0.
is multidimensional.
-or-

exception.span: 当前集合中的元素数目大于从 到目标数组的末尾的可用空间。

span.span: The number of elements in the current collection is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination array.

exception.span: 将当前集合的元素强制转换为目标数组的类型时发生问题，可能是由于失败的向下转换造成的。

span.span: A problem occurred casting the elements of the current collection to the type of the destination array, perhaps as the result of a failed downcast.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As DesignerActionList)

param.name: index
param.span: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入 value。

span.span: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入到集合中的 。

span.span: The to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 将提供的 插入到集合中的指定位置。

span.span: Inserts the supplied into the collection at the specified position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`参数等于的值属性，该新元素添加到集合的末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the property, the new element is added to the end of the collection. 在内部，类使用来包含它的集合对象。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 因为列表维护连续的元素，在插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 此重新排列在插入点后将更改元素的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于当前集合中的元素计数。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要从当前集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the current collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除特定 的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部，类使用来包含它的集合对象。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由于列表保持连续的元素，移除点之后的元素上移以占据空出的位置。Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot. 此重新排列的删除时间点后将更改元素的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
